text: Bhai last month me tere room se gaane bajte rehne ki aawaz and tere kabhi kabhi gaane ki aawaz mast thi xD baaki MTH ka rona and attendance lagake katne ke memories toh hamesha strong rahenge hi. Chaapte raho, milenge jald :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Are sir sir, aapki DPs toh campus ki sabse aag hoti hi hain xD Library ki last minute panic studying with the bois and multiple treats and maze hamesha yaad rahega. 201 ki BT ho gayi thi but chill hai everything is well that ends well. Maze karo, chaapte raho and jald milenge xD
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Bhai I still remember first year me raat ko TT room me jaake TT khelna and fir Inferno me hall 2 ko represent karna xD Uske baad utna touch me nahi the but last 2 months me aisa lagta hai sab compensate kar diya. I still maintain H12 me party ka main man tu hi hai and I’m sure Bangalore me bhi hoga :P Milte hain jald :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Mishra ji, Bokaro king. Aapke baat karne ki tehzeeb kisime nahi dekhi campus me. My favourite memory will always be you taking me in front of the hall 9 bathroom mirror and telling me “Ye dekhiye 4 Aditya” and then explaining BFS DFS and cryptography to me in the corridor lmao. You are one of the very few people who calls me Aditya in campus lol. Aapse unique sahi me kisiko nahi dekha, legit din me agarbatti jalate hain raat ko kuch aur. Bangalore me bhi bohot bhandi raatein hongi bro. Love our pictures from Antaragni and SG times. Maze kariye, jald milte hain :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Hello discord bot. Did you know that the first person convicted of speeding was going 8 miles per hour. Anyway, you have introduced me to the golden combination of chai sutta and I will always be grateful for that. You are one of the truest friends one can have and you have proven that so many times. Making sandwiches and cocktails for everyone- be it at 3 AM in the night or early morning, you are always there. Tere gifts to everyone and cool documentary recommendations- all are super cool. Tera cooler is actually insane bro, and don’t give up on art, that is one thing which makes you so unique and fun. Trek pe itna enthu kaise tha bhai tumme ab tak nahi samajh aaya xD Milte hain jald jaise hi gharwaale nikalne de mujhe, baaki aao raat clubhouse pe velle baithe hi hain sab :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: I still remember how we once talked about sex with the therapist as a porn category and then I had a link ready for it. There have been multiple “maal hai kya, paper hai kya, bong hai kya” conversations pre-lockdown and ig that’s what ganja gang has been about. Atreyee texting me though will remain the funniest memory of you lol. Awkwardness aside, you’re pretty chill, funny and hardworking and I admire that. All the best for the future :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text:
“Bro lock karke mat jaana nahane jaa raha hu”
“Bro thoda canteen wagareh ghoom ke aa 12 baje tak xD”
“Bro fuck TA, kaun padhega”
And a ton more memories. I’m lucky to have vibed with you and to have found you as a roommate. Our collective room beautification but at the same time the contrast between the two halves of the room will remain my favourite memory. I really got psyched by the way you even kept your socks properly dude. You have already highlighted a lot of key fun stuff in my memoir lol. One which you missed is the awe with which we were looking at each other when Kothari ate all that food in the canteen. End ke mahine me bhi tumhe bhand kar hi diya and of course your super organised room was ready as a sleep backup everytime too. OH ALSO WE SIGN OFF AS WANTED IN THE KD BUILDING WHAT COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER. I’m sure chill karte karte you will kill it in your field. All the best, milte hain jald :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Loved your streams and the vibe from day 1. I hope you make it big, and even if you don’t, the amount of creativity you have will surely amalgamate into something insane. Pool party na hone pe rr and nani stories with avisha and you on the rooftop still stay one of my favourite nights xD Have fun man and kill it and of course stay hydrated dost :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Goel bhaii..MTH ek raat pehle maggna, ek doosre ko exams ke liye uthana, wing waali court me kabhi kabhi baddy khelna yaad rahega. Chaapte raho, all the best :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Zaroor mauka milega dobaara bhai, hopefully iss baar uss din se thodi kam bhasad me :P Clubhouse ke paar bhi stories exchange karte hain kabhi. Cheers :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: You’re one of the sweetest and most dedicated people I have met on campus. Really appreciate your humility and will always remember me making you recite your full name on the CCD center table multiple times xD All the best man :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Jain Sirr, will always remember the last moment library gatherings with the bois before every MTH exam. And yes, highest in the room for sure someday xD All the best :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Hello ex-roomie (as you have recently started calling me, yes it’s weird). You are a typical example of super hard working insaan and then mast rona about everything as well. I’ll always cherish the random 4 AM yappy cafe visit we had after your oyo interview. Hopefully, dieting, plans to run away abroad and getting married to a Muslim is on decently xD Baaki detail me tumhare vogue gift me likh diya tha sab kuch, padhlo wapas. P.S. Still can’t get over the fact that you chose Mumbai over Bangalore :P
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Hello MTH god. Your notes have saved me so many times and I really thank you for that. Treasure hunt team me kaafi maze kiye the humne. You’ll kill it wherever you go of course, all the best :))
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Man down where you from n…. Sup twitter king? First year me our chutiya selves would make plans to beat biswa and kanan ka movie reviews, making the vox video in OAT, our second year versions thode zyada mature entering the bhandi world, the third year again chutiya selves talking if I should watch gossip girl and then fourth year selves just going bizarre around during daily trips- kaafi contrasting and fun memories I’ve had with you. Kill it in videsh, milenge soon hopefully :) P.S. Thanks for recommending IGOR, dapper shit
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: I think our last conversation in the OAT summed up pretty well about our memories lol, anyway, milte hai raat ko clubhouse pe :P
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Wassup Kejriwal (yeah I still prefer calling you this) Coaching time se dekha hai your enthusiasm towards trying out new things and being creative and you have maintained that till date which I really admire. Pehli baar high tere room pe hi hua tha and during the last days bhi tere room pe soya bhand hoke xD Do all the crazy stuff you do and be yourself. P.S. Thanks for that card at the end, very sweet and touche. All the best man, milte hain jald :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: JD broo, kaafi mast outgoing person ho tum and I really admire that. Playing among us during the beginning of lockdown to getting bullied ridiculously in chess later, kaafi maze aaye in the time spent together chaahe jitna bhi tha xD All the best bro, chaapte raho :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Chain waali photo kaafi swagger hai bhai. Hopefully ab tak twitter pe unblock kar diya hoga bc. Indiana waale se PVF ka prabandh karna hai kya ab bhi? Abhi kaafi maze karna, product decks banana seekhna and dance seekhna baaki hai tumse. Milte hai jald. *slaps ass (ig?)*
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Hmm, I don’t think I am still totally convinced Pink Floyd is that good xD We had some fun times in first year man. Always admired how hard working and dedicated you are, I’m sure you will be one of the best in whatever you go ahead with in life. P.S. I stalk your spotify and letterboxd sometimes, pretty dope :P
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Bhai gulab jamun me whiskey inject karne se lekar hall 12 me tere bade se speaker ke saath idhar udhar chakkar kaatna se lekar tere super fun stories and clubhouse pe random updates, you are a super fun person and nightout aaram se nikal sakta hai kisi random chhat pe chadhke. Itne saare kaand ki stories suni hai tujhse it's insane. Ghoomte raho India and jalate raho xD
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Bhai tumhara enthu insane hai. Jab bhi mila hu alag level energy rehti hai. Last month kaafi maze kiye and hopefully aage bhi karein. I know what I’m getting as a reply but I’ll still go ahead to say it- It must suck to be a KKR fan, no? :P Anyway, good to know cricket love is mutual. Deadline extend hote hue nahi dikh rahi anymore toh likh diya finally. All the best bro and jald milte hain :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Man writing this is weird. Bangalore chal jaldi photo nahi hai ek bhi saath me. P.S. random pics >> staged pics gang forever. Funniest guy. Ok bye
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Bro tumne itne achhe se summarise kar diya sab kuch mere memoir me that kuch bacha hi nahi likhne ko xD I will always remember how I almost always saw you passing by going towards the mess in that typical vox hoodie and jeans combo of yours. Chaapte raho, jald milenge :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Parshad broooo. Freelancing god, tech genius, iPad notes MTH Y17 saviour, sweetest friend- can’t decide on a title for you xD We’ve had super fun conversations and last month me miss kiya kaafi woh. The poster you gave me for my birthday will always be very very close to my heart. I will continue to pester you with my random tech doubts sometimes, ab jaldi job lagwao agle saal milte hain. Thanks for the memories dost, dil se :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Sir, aap God ho. Isse zyada kya hi bolein. First year me chutiya galaxy takneek ki nighout Hall ke computer room me maara tha side me and last year me aapko nashe karte hue dekh liya. Be it bitching about jhaatu launde, valuable sex lessons for the launde, setting the mehfil on hall 9 chhat ya fir speed cycling karke ice cream laana from shop c- jaldi milo wapas bhai and tab tak chaapte raho har jagah bc.
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Bhai MT pe tumhari kavita sun ke sahi me goosebumps aa gaye the, kisi din zaroor record karke kahin daalna, hit hogi pakka :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Bhaiyaaaaaaa, saare courses ka randi rona saath chalta aaya hai and unko rahat dene ke sessions bhi, chaahe wo bbq nation me ho ya fir tumhare roomie ke saath jiska naam aajtak yaad nahi mujhe. Campus me tumhari kami last ke mahine kaafi zyada feel hui and hopefully future me usko kahin compensate bhi kar denge. Saale DUGC toh tum naam ke the, department abhi bhi barbaad hai. Cricket and tennis love toh for life chalta rahega, ab batao sahi me F1 shuru karna kya? :P
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Wassssup Shreyash boi, you are one of the very very few people I have shared a single bed with without any regrets :P I remember that phase very vividly where we used to cry and rant about our love lives and satti CPI vibes raat bhar over text xD Lockdown me toh we spent kaafi quality time playing games (including the shitty rocket league) and chatting, going on the Udaipur trip where we made hearts with our hands and bodies in a public queue ffs, and of course you making dog noises in the background as I was taking the Chief Ed interviews xD I am watching our dancing video from Udaipur as I write this and I feel very lucky to have you as one of my close friends. Jaldi se matkagiri khatam karo, OF COURSE RR KAM KARO and jaldi milo :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Sidjayyyy, I think you are one of the sweetest and most organized people I have met on campus. Love your calm and composed way of debating and the random two-minute CCD hellos and chats we had. I’m sure you’ll kill it in the future. All the best :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: I will always be grateful for the last moment PSO crash course in the library before endsems xD Absolutely love your music (hopefully you continue posting) and I’m sure you’ll kill it with the physics thingy too. All the best :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Bhai tumhare saath jitna bhi minimal interaction hua aakhri dino me, loved every bit of it. Especially the Kanpuriya “hum” language ya fir Somesh ki kahaniyaan. Hopefully, jald milenge :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Kuwade brooooo, Vox ke tenures ki bakchodi and relying on you to prepare a write up quickly for any report or survey will remain with me forever. Pulkit and tera duo hamesha se iconic raha hai for me xD Love your chilled out attitude and I’m sure you’ll do well with whatever you plan to proceed. All the best :)
author: Aditya  Sonthalia

text: Probably like many other people, I am one of those jisko aapne pehli baar maal se introduce karwaya. Your favourite memory will still be you eating sooooo much food in hall 2 canteen after that sweet mango. Of course, no need to mention this but you are one of the best at what you do and I’m sure you will continue to achieve everything out there. All the best and jald milte hain, campus ke last 2 months compensate karne hain :P
author: Aditya  Sonthalia
